zyu19.libs.action.chain

Class AbstractActionChain<ThisType extends AbstractActionChain<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • zyu19.libs.action.chain.AbstractActionChain<ThisType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ThisType - The non-abstract Class that eventually extends this Abstract Class. This parameter is required in order to provide method chaining.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChainStyle<ThisType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionChain

    public abstract class AbstractActionChain<ThisType extends AbstractActionChain<?>>
extends Object
implements ChainStyle<ThisType>
    For usages of any implementation of this class, please refer to javadoc of ChainStyle and ErrorHolder.

    Users of this library can extends this class to build their own versions of ActionChain.

    This class contains every piece of fundamental code. Actually the ActionChain class is just an empty shell that "extends AbstractActionChain<ActionChain>".

    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Zhongzhi Yu
    See Also:
    ActionChain

      set the onFailure callback for 'PureAction' objects added subsequently Adding additional fail with class constraints will not wipe out your previous default failure handler, but the original handler will not be called if the specified exception was caught by this new onFailure handler.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public final <In> ReadOnlyChain start(NiceConsumer<In> onSuccess)
        Description copied from interface: ChainStyle
        Start running the 'PureAction' objects in ChainStyle.

        Your actions will be copied to another object so that you can call clear() immediately after start().

        Specified by:
        start in interface ChainStyle<ThisType extends AbstractActionChain<?>>
        Type Parameters:
        In - The input type of this action. Lambda will automatically set this template parameter.
        Parameters:
        onSuccess - if not null, it will be called after all actions finish without Exception.
        Returns:
        an Object representing the sequence of PureAction you created. Usually this object is useless but if you return this object inside another PureAction, then that PureAction will wait for this chain of actions to finish before it can finish.

      • clear

        public ThisType clear(NiceConsumer<ErrorHolder> onFailure)
        Description copied from interface: ChainStyle
        Clear all actions. You can call this function after start() so as to arrange a new sequence of actions.
        Specified by:
        clear in interface ChainStyle<ThisType extends AbstractActionChain<?>>
        Parameters:
        onFailure - the new onFailure callback for actions added afterwards. It can also be set to null.
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.

      • fail

        public final ThisType fail(NiceConsumer<ErrorHolder> onFailure)
        Description copied from interface: ChainStyle
        set the onFailure callback for 'PureAction' objects added subsequently
        Note: uncaught exceptions will be ignored so that it will not crash your app.
        Specified by:
        fail in interface ChainStyle<ThisType extends AbstractActionChain<?>>
        Parameters:
        onFailure - a callback to be invoked when any Exception is thrown from "actions" (or 'PureAction' objects).
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.

      • fail

        public <T extends Exception> ThisType fail(Class<T> claz,
                                           NiceConsumer<ErrorHolder<T>> onFailure)
        Description copied from interface: ChainStyle
        set the onFailure callback for 'PureAction' objects added subsequently Adding additional fail with class constraints will not wipe out your previous default failure handler, but the original handler will not be called if the specified exception was caught by this new onFailure handler.
        Note: uncaught exceptions will be ignored so that it will not crash your app.
        Specified by:
        fail in interface ChainStyle<ThisType extends AbstractActionChain<?>>
        Parameters:
        claz - specifying the type of Exception you want to catch, other types will not be caught.
        onFailure - a callback to be invoked when any Exception is thrown from "actions" (or 'PureAction' objects).
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.

      • then

        public <In,Out> ThisType then(boolean runOnWorkerThread,
                              PureAction<In,Out> action)
        Description copied from interface: ChainStyle
        Add a 'PureAction' object, or an "action", in this ChainStyle.
        Specified by:
        then in interface ChainStyle<ThisType extends AbstractActionChain<?>>
        Type Parameters:
        In - The input type of this action. Lambda will automatically set this template parameter.
        Out - The output type of this action. Lambda will automatically set this template parameter.
        Parameters:
        runOnWorkerThread - if set to false, the action will run on the main thread (UI thread) specified by ThreadChanger. Otherwise the task will run on any other thread (worker thread).
        action - the PureAction to be added.
        Returns:
        this object, thus enabling method chaining.
